id: Gina Rodriguez, America Ferrera, Latina actors campaign ahead of midterms
paragraph: In the final days before the midterm elections, Gina Rodriguez, America Ferrera and other Latina actors rallied in Kissimmee, Florida, for Democratic candidate for governor Andrew Gillum. They appealed to Latino voters on the issues of Puerto Rico hurricane recovery efforts, health care, and more.Nov. 4, 2018© 2018 NBC UNIVERSAL
